sourceDesc.p: [Information about the creation of the ODD]

body.p: This schema has been created to to constrain the TEI P5 for the purpose of producing a digital edition of the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage. In several limited cases we have also allowed attributes in places where the TEI P5 does not allow them. For a project containing one XML file a customization of the TEI would not normally be necessary. However, the document to which it will be applied originally came to Syriaca.org from the publisher of the print edition, Gorgias Press, as an XML file created from InDesign. Syriaca.org converted this into TEI and then put it through an extensive editing process that included marking up the cross references indicated in bold in the print edition and the application of many Syriaca.org URIs. We desired a schema customization to streamline this editing process and aid in the necessary additions of data.

moduleRef.include: choice p ref hi listBibl head bibl title corr sic editor resp respStmt date biblStruct label milestone monogr name note imprint pubPlace publisher foreign pb graphic reg orig abbr
teiHeader fileDesc titleStmt sponsor funder principal editionStmt edition publicationStmt authority availability licence sourceDesc idno
TEI text front body back div div1 div2 div3 byline dateline titlePage imprimatur docEdition docDate docImprint titlePart

classSpec.desc: I have needed to include this because it somehow disappeared from this customization. I do not know why this was necessary.

attDef.desc: This customization requires that the ab element have a type attribute with one of the following values.
This customization requires that the availability element have a status attribute with one of the following values.
This customization requires that the div element have a type attribute with one of the following values.
This customization requires that the values of the role attribute are constrained when applied to the editor element.
This customization requires that the foreign element have a rend attribute with the following value.
This customization requires that the foreign element have an xml:lang attribute and suggests the following values.
This customization requires that the values of the type attribute are constrained when applied to the head element.
This customization requires that the hi element have a rend attribute with one of the following values.
This customization makes the subtype attribute available to the idno element and constrains its value to the following.
This customization requires that the idno element have a type attribute with one of the following values.
This customization requires that the milestone element have a unit attribute with the following value.
This customization requires that the milestone element have an n attribute.
This customization requires that the values of the type attribute are constrained when applied to the note element.
This customization requires that the values of the rend attribute are constrained when applied to the ref element.
This customization requires that the values of the rend attribute are constrained when applied to the ref element.
This customization suggest values for the target attribute when applied to the ref element. These values are the GEDSH headwords.
This customization requires that the values of the rend attribute are constrained when applied to the title element.
